items.checkin_comment: Beer cartel #13. Big. This is more a big amber than a red, but still so good. Chewy, malty - going to go a long way to putting me to sleep for a Christmas afternoon nap. Merry Christmas to all my contacts in untappd land.

user.bio: I like beer tippage. Preferably in my face. Home brewer, my beer is always better.
Just a ordinary guy in search for extraordinary beers
Beer is good. Dogs and Cats are better.  Beer with Dogs and Cats....perfection
UT Moderator, Craft beer nut. Love the hops, love the darks, love the travelling and hanging out with beery people!
